tasks.description: Read the Joule model to set the working context and locate the Generator category and the object representing 'Nuclear generators in France'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the Generator category within the 'Joule' model to establish context for locating the object 'Nuclear generators in France'.

tasks.description: Using crud_pipeline, split the object 'Nuclear generators in France' into two new objects representing the North and South. Preserve structure, memberships, properties, and attributes; enforce that each new object name is limited to 4 characters.
